Debate on Equality

A cozy room, two men in discussion.  
Lebeziatnikov looks frustrated.  
Lebeziatnikov: “Kissing hands is an insult! Inequality!”  

Pyotr laughs, counting money.  
Pyotr: “What’s your point about rooms?”  
Lebeziatnikov: “Members can enter anytime! No privacy!”  

---  

A tense atmosphere, Lebeziatnikov fuming.  
Lebeziatnikov: “You think of the worst!”  
Pyotr: “It's just a debate, lighten up!”  

Lebeziatnikov: “Cleaning cesspools is honorable work!”  
Pyotr: “More honorable, he-he-he!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The discussion revolves around the concepts of personal privacy, equality, and the value of work in a future society.
